Text: Good preparation material for the upcoming S.T.A.L.K.E.R.- Shadow of Chernobyl game coming out.
Haven't heard of that game but will be keeping an eye out for it. Will it be available for PC or just Console?

PC Only I think.  Google it, there should be plenty of info on it, been waiting for it for five years, very anticipated game.  

As for this show, unless you know either Swedish or Russian, you will miss half the story, as the  little dramatic sequences aren't voiced over in English like the rest of the show.

Still, you get the basic idea of what happened.

The best programme I've seen on the subject is the BBC's "Surviving Disaster - Chernobyl Nuclear Disaster" which I'm currently downloading with emule.

Realy interesting! Download it if you like the subject :p I have played S.T.A.L.K.E.R Shadow of Chernobyl, a very interesting game :) Im waiting for the release of S.T.A.L.K.E.R Clear Sky. I hope it is fun..
This is a great documentary I recomend it.
the first stalker was the best, all the others after it were crap and they used the same engine which is too old now.
